pages.text: 55|41|kuṟṟavāḷikaḷ avaruṭe aṭayāḷaṁ keāṇṭ tiriccaṟiyappeṭuṁ. enniṭṭ (avaruṭe) kuṭumakaḷiluṁ pādaṅṅaḷiluṁ piṭikkappeṭuṁ
55|42|appēāḷ niṅṅaḷ iru vibhāgattinṟeyuṁ rakṣitāvinṟe anugrahaṅṅaḷil ētineyāṇ niṅṅaḷ niṣēdhikkunnat‌
55|43|itākunnu kuṟṟavāḷikaḷ niṣēdhicc taḷḷunnatāya narakaṁ
55|44|atinnuṁ tiḷaccupeāḷḷunna cuṭuveḷḷattinumiṭakk avar cuṟṟittiriyunnatāṇ‌
55|45|appēāḷ niṅṅaḷ iru vibhāgattinṟeyuṁ rakṣitāvinṟe anugrahaṅṅaḷil ētineyāṇ niṅṅaḷ niṣēdhikkunnat‌
55|46|tanṟe rakṣitāvinṟe sannidhiye bhayappeṭṭavann raṇṭ svargattēāppukaḷuṇṭ‌
55|47|appēāḷ niṅṅaḷ iru vibhāgattinṟeyuṁ rakṣitāvinṟe anugrahaṅṅaḷil ētineyāṇ niṅṅaḷ niṣēdhikkunnat‌
55|48|pala taraṁ sukha'aiśvaryaṅṅaḷuḷḷa raṇṭu (svargattēāppukaḷ)
55|49|appēāḷ niṅṅaḷ iru vibhāgattinṟeyuṁ rakṣitāvinṟe anugrahaṅṅaḷil ētineyāṇ niṅṅaḷ niṣēdhikkunnat‌
55|50|ava raṇṭiluṁ oḻukikeāṇṭirikkunna raṇṭu aruvikaḷuṇṭ‌
55|51|appēāḷ niṅṅaḷ iru vibhāgattinṟeyuṁ rakṣitāvinṟe anugrahaṅṅaḷil ētineyāṇ niṅṅaḷ niṣēdhikkunnat‌
55|52|ava raṇṭiluṁ ōrēā paḻavargattil ninnumuḷḷa ī raṇṭu inaṅṅaḷuṇṭ‌
55|53|appēāḷ niṅṅaḷ iru vibhāgattinṟeyuṁ rakṣitāvinṟe anugrahaṅṅaḷil ētineyāṇ niṅṅaḷ niṣēdhikkunnat‌
55|54|avar cila mettakaḷil cāri irikkunnavarāyirikkuṁ. avayuṭe uḷbhāgaṅṅaḷ kaṭṭikūṭiya paṭṭukeāṇṭ nirmikkappeṭṭatākunnu. ā raṇṭ tēāppukaḷileyuṁ kāykanikaḷ tāḻnnu nilkkukayāyirikkuṁ
55|55|appēāḷ niṅṅaḷ iru vibhāgattinṟeyuṁ rakṣitāvinṟe anugrahaṅṅaḷil ētineyāṇ niṅṅaḷ niṣēdhikkunnat‌
55|56|avayil dr̥ṣṭi niyantrikkunnavarāya strīkaḷuṇṭāyirikkuṁ. avarkk mump manuṣyanēā, jinnēā avare sparśicciṭṭilla
55|57|appēāḷ niṅṅaḷ iru vibhāgattinṟeyuṁ rakṣitāvinṟe anugrahaṅṅaḷil ētineyāṇ niṅṅaḷ niṣēdhikkunnat‌
55|58|avar māṇikyavuṁ paviḻavuṁ pēāleyāyirikkuṁ
55|59|appēāḷ niṅṅaḷ iru vibhāgattinṟeyuṁ rakṣitāvinṟe anugrahaṅṅaḷil ētineyāṇ niṅṅaḷ niṣēdhikkunnat‌
55|60|nalla pravr̥ttikkuḷḷa pratiphalaṁ nallat ceyt keāṭukkalallāte maṟṟu vallatumāṇēā
55|61|appēāḷ niṅṅaḷ iru vibhāgattinṟeyuṁ rakṣitāvinṟe anugrahaṅṅaḷil ētineyāṇ niṅṅaḷ niṣēdhikkunnat‌
55|62|ava raṇṭinuṁ puṟame vēṟeyuṁ raṇṭu svargattēāppukaḷuṇṭ‌
55|63|appēāḷ niṅṅaḷ iru vibhāgattinṟeyuṁ rakṣitāvinṟe anugrahaṅṅaḷil ētineyāṇ niṅṅaḷ niṣēdhikkunnat‌
55|64|kaṭuṁ paccayaṇiñña raṇṭusvargattēāppukaḷ
55|65|appēāḷ niṅṅaḷ iru vibhāgattinṟeyuṁ rakṣitāvinṟe anugrahaṅṅaḷil ētineyāṇ niṅṅaḷ niṣēdhikkunnat‌
55|66|ava raṇṭiluṁ kuticceāḻukunna raṇṭu aruvikaḷuṇṭ‌
55|67|appēāḷ niṅṅaḷ iru vibhāgattinṟeyuṁ rakṣitāvinṟe anugrahaṅṅaḷil ētineyāṇ niṅṅaḷ niṣēdhikkunnat‌
